threat: An authenticated attacker could exploit this to cause a denial of service by creating an image with a large virtual size with little data, then filling the virtual disk..
special:
The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:
  python-nova
2012.1.3+stable-20130423-e52e6912-0ubuntu1.1
In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
